6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.67: Repel Reduced duration from 5/10/15/20 to 6/8/10/12. Reduced cooldown from 20 to 14. Reduced manacost from 60/70/80/90 to 50 on each level.
6.81b: Degen Aura Increased movement speed slow from 7%/14%/21%/28% to 10%/18%/26%/34%. Increased attack speed slow from 7/14/21/28 to 10/18/26/34.
6.04: Increased  Guardian Angel manacost from 75/100/140 to 125/150/200.
6.79: Degen Aura Increased radius from 315 to 350. Increased stickiness from 0.5 to 1.
6.50: Changed  Purification damage type from Physical to Pure.
6.00: Purification no longer damages wards.  Degen Aura Reduced movement speed slow from 10%/20%/30%/40% to 7%/14%/21%/28%. Increased radius from 220 to 300.  Guardian Angel now has a 75/100/140 manacost.
6.35: Increased base armor from 1 to 2 (total armor is now 4.1).
6.55: Guardian Angel Reduced radius from 900 to 600. Reduced duration from 5/7/9 to 5/6/7.
6.10: Fixed some memory leak issues on  Purification. Increased  Repel cooldown from 12 to 20.
6.53: Purification now applies the heal before applying the area damage.
6.78: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Omniknight: Increases  Guardian Angel from 600 to radius to global and makes it affect buildings.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  Degen Aura radius from 300 to 315.
6.77: Increased  Purification cast range from 400/500/600/700 to 700 on each level.
6.76: Increased Movement speed from 300 to 305. Reduced  Purification cooldown from 12 to 10.
6.70: Degen Aura now also reduces attack speed 7/14/21/28.
6.72: Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Increased  Purification cast range from 400 on each level to 400/500/600/700.
6.82c: Guardian Angel no longer grants 25 health regeneration for its duration to all affected allies.
6.80: Increased  Degen Aura stickiness from 1 to 2.
6.81: Increased  Purification damage radius from 225 to 240.  Repel no longer removes buffs on allies and debuffs on enemies. That means that  Repel no longer removes  Guardian Angel. Increased  Guardian Angel duration from 5/6/7 to 6/7/8 ( 8/9/10).
6.82: Increased base armor from 2 to 3 (total armor is now 5.1) Increased  Purification damage radius from 240 to 260.
6.84: Reduced  Purification cast point from 0.5 to 0.4.
6.20: Purification Reduced heal from 100/200/300/400 to 90/180/270/360. Increased damage from 75/150/225/300 to 90/180/270/360.
6.70b: Degen Aura no longer affects buildings.
6.28: Increased  Guardian Angel manacost from 125/150/200 to 125/175/250.
